title: Practical Learning-Based Training Program for Enhancing Nursing Humanities Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in asynchronous learning environments using digital devices, emphasizing case-based activities and reflective journaling

learning_goals: Learners can apply empathetic communication skills in various medical scenarios with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can integrate and present three or more humanities-based elements when developing patient-centered care plans.
Learners can analyze their caregiving practices through reflective journaling and develop improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
